items.content_html: Cosmo Picker is a lightweight and highly customizable date picker designed for React applications.
items.title: emirkrhan/cosmo-date-picker: Cosmo Picker is a lightweight and highly customizable date picker designed for React applications.

items.content_html: A React-based template for lightweight Rise of Kingdoms websites.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.
items.title: FrozenProductions/Frost-UI: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.

items.content_html: A lightweight SDK for integrating token swaps and liquidity management on the TON Blockchain. Easily build TON DEX functionality with TypeScript support.
items.title: MyTonSwap/sdk: A lightweight SDK for integrating token swaps and liquidity management on the TON Blockchain. Easily build TON DEX functionality with TypeScript support.

items.content_html: A lightweight web interface for yt-dlp, featuring a clean dark theme design and real-time download progress tracking. Built with NodeJS, HTML, CSS and JS.
items.title: developedbyalex/basicYTDLGUI: A lightweight web interface for yt-dlp, featuring a clean dark theme design and real-time download progress tracking. Built with NodeJS, HTML, CSS and JS.

items.content_html: A lightweight and simple task timer to help you track time and boost productivity. Designed for developers and productivity enthusiasts, this project is featured in a YouTube tutorial. Easy to use and minimalistic. Check it out and stay on track!
items.title: dimasabimanyy/task-tracker: A lightweight and simple task timer to help you track time and boost productivity. Designed for developers and productivity enthusiasts, this project is featured in a YouTube tutorial. Easy to use and minimalistic. Check it out and stay on track!

items.content_html: An open-source, lightweight tier list creator. Craft custom rankings, use pre-made templates, and easily share your tier lists. No account needed - just create, rank, and share!
items.title: infinia-yzl/opentierboy: An open-source, lightweight tier list creator. Craft custom rankings, use pre-made templates, and easily share your tier lists. No account needed - just create, rank, and share!

items.content_html: Tilted is a lightweight TS library for displaying game maps and other content in a modern way.

items.title: rperezll/ng-fast-toast: A lightweight Angular library for stylish toast alerts, built for Tailwind with a simple, customizable API.

items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: a collection of lightweight TypeScript packages for AT Protocol, the protocol powering Bluesky.

items.content_html: This OsmAnd plugin includes a lightweight map style that highlights road and trail conditions for off-road motorcycles.
items.title: cmoffroad/osmand-dirtbike-plugin: This OsmAnd plugin includes a lightweight map style that highlights road and trail conditions for off-road motorcycles.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension for saving and managing web links. Features include saving custom links, saving the current tab’s URL, and deleting all saved links. The extension leverages local storage to persist links across sessions, offering an easy-to-use tool for link tracking and organization.
items.title: Niranthara2004/Leads-Tracker: A lightweight Chrome extension for saving and managing web links. Features include saving custom links, saving the current tab’s URL, and deleting all saved links. The extension leverages local storage to persist links across sessions, offering an easy-to-use tool for link tracking and organization.
